last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 1
last_episode_to_air.overview: The story of a successful couple of TV hosts from a news channel. They are just marriaged by convenience and extortion of the network's owner. Actually, they can't stand each of other.

name: Los exitosos Pells
overview: Martín Pells and Sol Costa are a  successful couple of TV hosts from a news channel called TV News. This is all a lie of course, their fictional life turns out to be very profitable for the network. Esteban Nuñez, owner of N Noticias, the rival network, tries to get Martín to his own network in order to destroy Franca Andrade, owner of TV News. To prevent this, Franca gets Pells into a comatose state after hitting his head. This leads to finding a second Martín Pells.
